The 27-year-old Kampl switches from Bayer Leverkusen for a reported fee of €20m (£18.4m).

His versatility as a defensive midfielder or winger means Kampl could potentially fill the playmaker role Keita will vacate when he leaves for Anfield at the end of the season.
